entry.title: Custom T-Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: custom
Price: 55.00

FOR CUSTOM T-SHIRT BULK ORDER: Contact us to get discounted quote!

* YOU CAN CHOOSE ANY COLOR AND ADD LOGO TO FRONT, BACK OR SLEEVE SIDE **

Note: Please be aware of production and processing time takes 5-6 weeks for custom print

After placing an order, reply to our email confirmation with your custom design logo in the high-quality transparent background file (PDF/SVG/Vector). Also, include a basic sketch for the positioning of your design.

STRICTLY NO CANCELLATION/REFUND/RETURN ONCE DESIGN ARE CONFIRMED.

Custom T-Shirt is a perfect way to provide you a great material while unlocking your creativity and showing off your personalized outfit.  Create your own favorite message and design. We want you to feel and look amazing in your personalized design while enjoying the comfort of our products' quality.

WHY XMARTIAL CUSTOM T-SHIRT?

  • MATERIAL: 100% Cotton, Non-chafe fabric taping reinforces neck and shoulders
  • BREATHABLE AND COMFY This lightweight t-shirt is sweat-absorbent and breathable, so you can feel comfortable and sweat-free in the summer.
  • VERSATILE: Whether you’re hiking, fishing, popping to the gym, or heading for a night out, our men’s casual t-shirts will keep up! The natural material and the classic shape make them incredibly versatile! They’re great active fit undershirts OR minimal, plain t-shirts that match your favorite jeans or formal dress pants.
  • COLOR VARIATIONS: You can choose any color of your choice.

Custom Boxing Gloves is a perfect way to personalize your boxing gloves which can be used for boxing, Muay Thai and MMA training. We want your order to be made just the way you want it! Make your own customized boxing gloves by adding your own design. 

WHY XMARTIAL CUSTOM BOXING GLOVES?

  • PREMIUM QUALITY: Crafted from the finest quality full leather custom boxing gloves and constructed with care to endure through years of use in the toughest Muay Thai, Boxing, and MMA gyms in the world
  • WRIST SUPPORT: The padded wrist of the boxing glove, with its integrated Velcro-wrist strap, helps hold the wrist steady and guard against impact from kicks and punch.
  • COMFORTABLE FIT: Weight suggested by professional trainers: Available in 12- or 14-ounce weight sizes; Anti-microbial treatment fights offensive odors and bacterial growth.

Be the height of comfort and style in Custom Jogger Pants. These trendy pants feature drawstring ties, tapered legs, and bottom cuffs. It improves your overall functionality, whether it’s weightlifting, running, or cycling. a workout or everyday casual wear.  Add your own personal touch by adding logo, designs, and message on your workout pants, and make your passion known!

WHY XMARTIAL CUSTOM JOGGER PANTS?

  • COMFORTABLE MATERIAL: 65% Cotton, more breathable and softer; 35% Elastic fiber, jogger with highly stretchable material offers great flexibility and comfort of movement during a workout.
  • PERFECT DESIGN: Stylish design of tapered leg and drawstring closure make you look slim and fit. The elastic cuff is not too tight and gives the Sweatpants great mobility during exercising
  • ZIPPER POCKET: Two large deep side zipper pockets design, convenience, and safety to keep your phone and other valuable items in them when doing exercise
  • VERSATILE: Suitable for yoga, gym, leisure, home, outdoor, sports like running, workout, fitness, training, jogging, basketball, fishing, baseball, hiking, bodybuilding, dancing, etc.

WHY XMARTIAL CUSTOM HOODIES?

  • MATERIAL: 60% Polyester, 40% Cotton, skin-friendly, breathable, super soft, and lightweight perfect for workout, running, jogging, skateboarding, basketball, gym, hunting, camping, fishing in autumn and winter.

entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL

FOR CUSTOM RASH GUARD BULK ORDER: Contact us to get discounted quote!

IN-HOUSE DESIGNER AVAILABLE FOR ASSISTANCE: Rate depends on type and project concept.

Note: Please be aware of production and processing time takes 5-6 weeks for custom print.

We also offer water sports custom rash guard in bulk order made with specific fabric for water-sports with total protection against UV rays (UPF50+). The perfect custom rash guard for water sport activities like surfing, paddling, snorkeling, etc. Contact us to request quote!

After placing an order, reply to our email confirmation with your custom design logo in the high-quality transparent background file (PDF/SVG/Vector). Also, include a basic sketch for the positioning of your design.

STRICTLY NO CANCELLATION/REFUND/RETURN ONCE DESIGN ARE CONFIRMED.

Custom Rash Guard is a perfect way to provide you the best material while transforming your artistic vision into premium graphic apparel. We want you to feel and look amazing in your personalized design while enjoying the comfort of our products' quality. Unleash your creativity and make your passion known!

Our Custom BJJ Rash Guard is a staple for any rash guard collection. The sleek black design is suited for any belt rank or team, with or without the gi, MMA, or nogi. Whatever the training, black is always in. Fully sublimated custom bjj rash guard.

WHY PREMIUM?

Our premium custom BJJ rash guards are made with quality polyester/spandex material designed to last. It won’t rip due to multi-panel stitching for extra strength and our gel-panel technology at the openings to keep it in place. It is specially made for intense MMA grappling and Jiu-Jitsu training.

MATERIAL: Made of a mixture of Polyester and Spandex, this makes our premium rash guard strong, durable, flexible, stretchable, non-shrinkable, and lightweight to give maximum comfort.

DESIGN: A unique and smart compression design enhances your blood circulation to the muscles, keeps sweat away, ensuring your body is dry and keeps your muscles warm. You will also have the privilege to choose the design that you want for your rash guard. 

STITCHING: Multi-panel construction, high-density flat-lock stitching for optimal fit and durability. Because of its flexibility, our premium rash guard changes its shape according to your movement, making this product a great fit for any body type.

GRAPHICS: This rash guard has a black premium color. Black absorbs all light in the color spectrum as a fighter absorbs all skills through proper training and exercise.

Custom BJJ/MMA Shorts are a perfect way to provide you high-performance athletic shorts for combat sports and functional fitness while transforming your artistic vision into premium graphic apparel. Fully sublimated Custom BJJ/MMA Shorts, we want you to feel and look amazing in your personalized design while enjoying the comfort of our products' quality. Unleash your creativity and make your passion known!

Why XMARTIAL Shorts:


  • Anti-slip gel panel added technology for extra grip and comfort.
  • Inside drawstring & velcro waistband enclosure for a secure fit
  • Crafted with the finest fabrics to withstand the toughest training conditions. 
  • Moist-wicking technology to keep away sweats.
  • Fully sublimated graphics that won't crack, peel, or fade over time and maintain a great look. 
  • Breathable, stretchy, and quick dry for maximum comfort. 
  • One-Year Warranty, we stand behind our product quality.
  • 100% Money-Back Guarantee, risk-free buy.
  • Optimized for the highest level of athletic performance in BJJ, MMA, catch wrestling, no-gi, and submission grappling
